meanings.definition: Make or become lively or animated.
meanings.sent1: Playing music always livens up the party.
meanings.sent2: The colorful decorations livens the room.
meanings.sent3: The joke he told really livens the mood.
meanings.sent4: Her smile livens the dreary day like sunshine.

meanings.sent1: A good night's sleep livens you up for the day.
meanings.sent2: The fresh air livens the tired hiker.
meanings.sent3: A cup of coffee always livens me up in the morning.
meanings.sent4: The rain livens the thirsty plants in the garden.
meanings.sent5: Exercise can really livens your spirits.

meanings.sent1: Adding some color livens the plain room.
meanings.sent2: Her cheerful personality livens every conversation.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected visit livens the otherwise dull day.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of fresh flowers livens the room.
meanings.sent5: A good book can truly livens your imagination.
